entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: The Fat Lady is a portrait that guards the entrance to the Gryffindor common room. She is described as looking sternly back at Harry and refusing him entrance without a password.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who is trying to enter the Gryffindor common room. He is described as glumly staring up at the Fat Lady.

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who helps Harry by guessing the password and remembering it for once.

entities.name: mimbulus mimbletonia
entities.description: Mimbulus mimbletonia is a type of plant that Neville shows to Harry on the train. It is also the correct password to enter the Gryffindor common room.

entities.name: gryffindor common room
entities.description: The Gryffindor common room is a cozy circular tower room that Harry and Neville enter after giving the correct password.

relationships.description: Harry tries to enter the Gryffindor common room but is refused by the Fat Lady without a password.
Neville remembers the correct password, Mimbulus mimbletonia, which he had shown to Harry on the train.
Neville helps Harry by guessing the correct password and remembering it for once.
Mimbulus mimbletonia is the correct password to enter the Gryffindor common room.
